DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to collate local information to better understand the motivations, accessibility and frequency of assisted reproductive technology (ART) use in the community.
DOC.detailed_description: The ART survey study recruitment will last about 6 months with the study completed within 1 year. Study participation is an online survey which takes approximately 3 minutes to complete. The goal is to apply for future funding to study the metabolic consequences of being conceived with ART.
DOC.criteria: Any individual may complete this survey No exclusion criteria
